linear-progress-height.description: 4px - Height of the progress bar track

linear-progress-border-radius.description: 8px - Border radius of progress bar and indicator

linear-progress-color-track.description: Background color of the progress bar track

linear-progress-color-indicator.description: Color of the progress indicator (both determinate and indeterminate)

linear-progress-percentage-gap.description: 8px - Gap between the progress bar and percentage text

linear-progress-percentage-width.description: Fixed width for percentage text to prevent layout shift
